about_the_game:
DLC Bundle Shinsengumi Set contains the following items:

A new mission set that unlocks custom parts and original weapons. Join the Shinsengumi. Includes character model, dandara-patterned haori coat, accessories, Kotetsu and Izuminokami Kanesada weapons and a western wear model featuring a Toshizo Hijikata motif. Available after working for Rihito Shirube in the main plaza.
